name: 鄭以旋
objective: The course is designed for year-2 engineering students. We will read and discuss writings related to engineering from textbooks, websites, and academic journals etc. with the objective of students acquiring the necessary language skills to understand and communicate in their field of expertise.

1		Introduction	
2		Basic engineering I
3	Basic engineering II
4		Basic engineering III
5		Engineering news I
6		Engineering news II
7		Engineering news III
8		Group presentations
9		School Mid-term
10		Research I
11		Research II
12		Research III
13		Philosophy of science
14		Speaking Test
15		Revision
16		Exam	
17 		Consultation
18		Consultation
scorePolicy:
Group presentation			20%
School mid-term			20%
Speaking test*				20%
Final exam*				20%
Participation and attendance		20%

*At the lecturer’s sole discretion, a makeup exam or test may be granted upon presentation of a note of approval for leave from the university system no later than 5 days after the date of the test or exam. The format of the make-up test or exam will be determined by the lecturer.

Attendance policy
You will automatically receive a grade of zero with 13 or more unexcused absences from Week 2 onwards. You may get an excused absence only upon presentation of a note of approval for leave from the university system to the Class Rep.
consultation: Students may make appointments for consultation.
